docs: HiddenHand - Privacy Poker on Solana
Using MagicBlock VRF for provably fair shuffling and
Inco FHE for cryptographic card privacy

instructions.name: callback_shuffle
docs: VRF callback - ATOMIC shuffle + encrypt
Called by VRF oracle, not directly by users
SECURITY: The VRF seed is NEVER stored in account state!
Shuffle and encryption happen atomically in this single transaction.

instructions.name: close_inactive_table
docs: Close an inactive table and return all funds to players
Can be called by anyone after 1 hour of inactivity
Table must be in Waiting status (not mid-hand)
All seated players receive their chips back

accounts.name: caller
docs: Anyone can call this after timeout

accounts.name: vault
docs: The vault holding player funds

instructions.name: create_table
docs: Create a new poker table

accounts.name: vault
docs: Vault to hold player buy-ins

instructions.name: deal_cards
docs: Deal cards to all players and post blinds
SB and BB seats are named accounts, others via remaining_accounts
NOTE: For provably fair games, use request_shuffle + callback_shuffle instead
WARNING: This stores plaintext cards - use deal_cards_encrypted for privacy!

accounts.name: caller
docs: Anyone can call, but non-authority must wait for timeout

accounts.name: sb_seat
docs: Small blind player seat

accounts.name: bb_seat
docs: Big blind player seat

instructions.name: deal_cards_encrypted
docs: Deal cards with ATOMIC Inco encryption (RECOMMENDED for privacy)
Cards are encrypted immediately during dealing - NEVER stored as plaintext
After calling this, use grant_card_allowance for each player to enable decryption

accounts.name: caller
docs: The caller (authority can call immediately, others must wait for timeout)

accounts.name: sb_seat
docs: Small blind player seat

accounts.name: bb_seat
docs: Big blind player seat

accounts.name: inco_program
docs: The Inco Lightning program for encryption

instructions.name: deal_cards_vrf
docs: DEPRECATED: Use request_shuffle instead!
Deal hole cards - kept for backwards compatibility only.
With Modified Option B, callback_shuffle handles everything atomically.

accounts.name: sb_seat
docs: Small blind player seat

accounts.name: bb_seat
docs: Big blind player seat

accounts.name: inco_program
docs: The Inco Lightning program for encryption

instructions.name: encrypt_hole_cards
docs: Phase 1: Encrypt hole cards using Inco FHE
Called via Magic Actions after ER commit
Encrypts plaintext cards and stores handles in PlayerSeat
Call once per player with their seat_index
IMPORTANT: After this, call grant_card_allowance to enable decryption

accounts.name: authority
docs: The table authority

accounts.name: player_seat
docs: The player seat to encrypt cards for

accounts.name: inco_program
docs: The Inco Lightning program for encryption

instructions.name: grant_card_allowance
docs: Phase 2: Grant decryption allowance for encrypted cards
Must be called AFTER encrypt_hole_cards
Client should derive allowance PDAs from stored handles:
PDA = ["allowance", handle.to_le_bytes(), player_pubkey]

accounts.name: authority
docs: The table authority - only authority can grant allowances

accounts.name: player_seat
docs: The player seat with encrypted cards

accounts.name: allowance_card1
docs: Allowance account for card 1
Must be PDA: ["allowance", hole_card_1.to_le_bytes(), player_pubkey]

accounts.name: allowance_card2
docs: Allowance account for card 2
Must be PDA: ["allowance", hole_card_2.to_le_bytes(), player_pubkey]

accounts.name: player
docs: The player who should be able to decrypt

accounts.name: inco_program
docs: The Inco Lightning program

instructions.name: grant_community_allowances
docs: Grant community card allowances to a player
This enables the player to decrypt community cards via Inco, which is needed
if they want to reveal community cards when authority is AFK
Called by authority after VRF shuffle for each active player.
remaining_accounts: 5 allowance PDAs for community cards [card0-card4]

accounts.name: authority
docs: Authority granting allowances (only authority can grant)

accounts.name: player_seat
docs: The player seat to grant allowances for

accounts.name: player
docs: The player who should be able to decrypt

accounts.name: inco_program
docs: The Inco Lightning program

instructions.name: grant_own_allowance
docs: Allow player to grant their OWN decryption allowance after timeout
If authority doesn't grant allowances within 60 seconds, players can self-grant
This prevents the game from getting stuck if authority is AFK

accounts.name: player
docs: The player granting their own allowance (must be the seat owner)

accounts.name: allowance_card1
docs: Allowance account for card 1 (will be created by Inco CPI)

accounts.name: allowance_card2
docs: Allowance account for card 2 (will be created by Inco CPI)

accounts.name: inco_program
docs: The Inco Lightning program

instructions.name: join_table
docs: Join a table with a buy-in

accounts.name: vault
docs: Vault to receive buy-in (SystemAccount validates System Program ownership)

instructions.name: leave_table
docs: Leave a table and cash out

accounts.name: vault
docs: Vault to withdraw from (SystemAccount validates System Program ownership)

instructions.name: player_action
docs: Perform a player action (fold, check, call, raise, all-in)

instructions.name: request_shuffle
docs: Request VRF randomness for card shuffling
This initiates the shuffle - VRF oracle will callback with randomness
IMPORTANT: Pass all player seat accounts as remaining_accounts!
The callback will shuffle + encrypt cards atomically.

accounts.name: inco_program
docs: The Inco Lightning program for encryption (passed to callback)

instructions.name: reveal_cards
docs: Reveal cards at showdown with Ed25519 signature verification
Players call this at Showdown phase to reveal their decrypted cards.
The transaction must include Ed25519 verification instructions from
Inco's attested decryption to prove the revealed values are correct.

accounts.name: player
docs: The player revealing their cards (must be the seat owner)

accounts.name: instructions_sysvar
docs: Instructions sysvar for Ed25519 signature verification

instructions.name: reveal_community
docs: Reveal community cards (flop/turn/river) with Ed25519 signature verification
Authority calls this when betting round completes and community cards need to be revealed.
Community cards are encrypted during VRF shuffle for privacy - this reveals them.
The transaction must include Ed25519 verification instructions for each card from
Inco's attested decryption to prove the revealed values are correct.
Card count depends on phase:
- PreFlop -> Flop: 3 cards (or 5 if all-in runout)
- Flop -> Turn: 1 card (or 2 if all-in runout)
- Turn -> River: 1 card

accounts.name: caller
docs: Caller revealing the community cards
Authority can call immediately, others must wait for timeout

accounts.name: instructions_sysvar
docs: Instructions sysvar for Ed25519 signature verification

instructions.name: showdown
docs: Showdown - evaluate hands and distribute pot
Remaining accounts should be all player seat accounts

accounts.name: caller
docs: Anyone can call showdown, but non-authority must wait for timeout

accounts.name: vault
docs: Vault holding player chips

instructions.name: start_hand
docs: Start a new hand (table authority only)

accounts.name: caller
docs: Anyone can call, but non-authority must wait for timeout

instructions.name: timeout_player
docs: Timeout a player who hasn't acted within 60 seconds
Anyone can call this to keep the game moving
Auto-checks if possible, otherwise auto-folds

accounts.name: caller
docs: Anyone can trigger a timeout (doesn't need to be authority or the timed-out player)

accounts.name: player_seat
docs: The seat of the player being timed out

instructions.name: timeout_reveal
docs: Timeout a player who hasn't revealed cards at showdown
After 3 minutes without revealing, any player can call this to "muck" the non-revealer
Mucked players forfeit their claim to the pot (standard poker rules)

accounts.name: caller
docs: Anyone can call this after timeout

errors.name: NotEnoughPlayers
errors.msg: Table is not full enough to start

errors.name: PlayerNotAtTable
errors.msg: Player is not at this table

errors.name: PlayerAlreadyAtTable
errors.msg: Player is already at this table

errors.name: InvalidAction
errors.msg: Invalid action for current game state

errors.name: CannotFold
errors.msg: Cannot fold - no bet to fold from

errors.name: CannotCheck
errors.msg: Cannot check - must call or raise

errors.name: ActionNotTimedOut
errors.msg: Player has not timed out yet - must wait 60 seconds

errors.name: UnauthorizedAuthority
errors.msg: Only table authority can perform this action

errors.name: ShowdownRequiresPlayers
errors.msg: Showdown requires at least 2 active players

errors.name: DeckAlreadyShuffled
errors.msg: Deck already shuffled for this hand

errors.name: DeckNotShuffled
errors.msg: Deck not yet shuffled - request VRF shuffle first

errors.name: TableNotWaiting
errors.msg: Table is not in waiting state

errors.name: InvalidAccountCount
errors.msg: Invalid account count - expected multiple of 3 for encryption

errors.name: PlayerNotActive
errors.msg: Player is not active (folded or not playing)

errors.name: PlayersNotRevealed
errors.msg: All active players must reveal before showdown can complete

errors.name: TimeoutNotReached
errors.msg: Timeout not reached - must wait longer

errors.name: HandInProgress
errors.msg: Cannot perform this action while hand is in progress

errors.name: AwaitingCommunityReveal
errors.msg: Waiting for community cards to be revealed - authority must call reveal_community

errors.name: CommunityNotReady
errors.msg: Community cards not ready for reveal - betting round not complete

errors.name: InvalidCommunityCards
errors.msg: Invalid community cards for current phase

types.name: DeckState
docs: Encrypted deck state for a hand
Cards are stored as Inco encrypted handles
SECURITY NOTE: The VRF seed is NEVER stored here!
It only exists in memory during the atomic shuffle+encrypt in callback_shuffle.
This eliminates the account state leak vector.

fields.name: hand
docs: Reference to hand

fields.name: cards
docs: Shuffled encrypted cards (Inco handles)
Each u128 is a handle to an encrypted card value (0-51)
First 5 cards (indices 0-4) are community cards (plaintext until revealed)
Remaining cards are encrypted hole cards

fields.name: deal_index
docs: Next card index to deal

fields.name: is_shuffled
docs: Whether deck has been shuffled and cards encrypted

fields.name: bump
docs: PDA bump

fields.name: _reserved
docs: Reserved space for future use (maintains account size compatibility)
Previously: vrf_seed [u8; 32] + seed_received bool = 33 bytes

types.name: HandCompleted
docs: Emitted when a hand completes (showdown or everyone folds)
Contains all information needed to reconstruct and verify the hand

fields.name: table_id
docs: Table identifier

fields.name: hand_number
docs: Sequential hand number

fields.name: timestamp
docs: Unix timestamp when hand completed

fields.name: community_cards
docs: Community cards (5 cards, 255 = not dealt)

fields.name: total_pot
docs: Total pot that was distributed

fields.name: player_count
docs: Number of players who participated

fields.name: results
docs: Results for each player (up to 6)
Using fixed array because Vec has variable size issues with events

fields.name: results_count
docs: How many results are valid (rest are zeroed)

fields.name: table
docs: Reference to parent table

fields.name: hand_number
docs: Hand number (matches table.hand_number when created)

fields.name: phase
docs: Current phase of the hand

fields.name: pot
docs: Total pot in lamports

fields.name: current_bet
docs: Current bet to call

fields.name: min_raise
docs: Minimum raise amount

fields.name: dealer_position
docs: Dealer position for this hand

fields.name: action_on
docs: Seat index of player whose turn it is

fields.name: community_cards
docs: Community cards (card indices 0-51, 255 = not revealed)

fields.name: community_revealed
docs: Number of community cards revealed (0, 3, 4, or 5)

fields.name: active_players
docs: Bitmap of players still active in hand

fields.name: acted_this_round
docs: Bitmap of players who have acted this round

fields.name: active_count
docs: Number of active players

fields.name: all_in_players
docs: Bitmap of players who are all-in

fields.name: last_action_time
docs: Last action timestamp for timeout tracking (unix timestamp)

fields.name: hand_start_time
docs: Timestamp when hand started (unix timestamp)

fields.name: awaiting_community_reveal
docs: Whether we're waiting for authority to reveal community cards
Set to true when betting round completes and phase needs to advance

fields.name: bump
docs: PDA bump

types.name: PlayerHandResult
docs: Individual player's result in a hand

fields.name: player
docs: Player's wallet pubkey

fields.name: seat_index
docs: Seat index (0-5)

fields.name: hole_card_1
docs: Hole cards (255 = not shown / folded)

fields.name: hand_rank
docs: Hand rank (0=HighCard, 1=Pair, ..., 9=RoyalFlush, 255=folded/not evaluated)

fields.name: chips_won
docs: Chips won this hand (0 if lost)

fields.name: chips_bet
docs: Total bet this hand (chips put into pot)

fields.name: folded
docs: Whether player folded

fields.name: all_in
docs: Whether player was all-in

fields.name: table
docs: Reference to table

fields.name: player
docs: Player's wallet

fields.name: seat_index
docs: Seat index (0 to max_players-1)

fields.name: chips
docs: Player's chip stack at this table

fields.name: current_bet
docs: Amount bet in current betting round

fields.name: total_bet_this_hand
docs: Total amount invested in current hand

fields.name: hole_card_1
docs: Encrypted hole card 1 (Inco handle)

fields.name: hole_card_2
docs: Encrypted hole card 2 (Inco handle)

fields.name: revealed_card_1
docs: Revealed plaintext card 1 (0-51, or 255 if not revealed)
Set via reveal_cards instruction with Ed25519 verification

fields.name: revealed_card_2
docs: Revealed plaintext card 2 (0-51, or 255 if not revealed)

fields.name: cards_revealed
docs: Whether player has revealed their cards for showdown

fields.name: status
docs: Current status

fields.name: has_acted
docs: Has acted in current betting round

fields.name: bump
docs: PDA bump

fields.name: authority
docs: Table creator/authority

fields.name: table_id
docs: Unique table identifier

fields.name: small_blind
docs: Small blind amount in lamports

fields.name: big_blind
docs: Big blind amount (typically 2x small blind)

fields.name: min_buy_in
docs: Minimum buy-in amount

fields.name: max_buy_in
docs: Maximum buy-in amount

fields.name: max_players
docs: Maximum players allowed (2-6)

fields.name: current_players
docs: Current number of seated players

fields.name: status
docs: Current table status

fields.name: hand_number
docs: Current hand number (increments each hand)

fields.name: occupied_seats
docs: Bitmap of occupied seats (bit i = seat i occupied)

fields.name: dealer_position
docs: Dealer button position (seat index)

fields.name: last_ready_time

fields.name: bump
docs: PDA bump
